Highlights include daily rainforest walks and stops at blackwater-flooded forests; Lago Turia, a giant lake with a river island; the Rio Jaueperi, with opportunities for fishing — piranhas!
The seven-day trip departs from (and returns to) Manaus on the Rio Negro, a major tributary of the Amazon.
— and swimming in some of the world's cleanest water; and a visit to the Lago Janauari Ecological Park.
